snippet.title: Hard West 2 - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Wild West and occult collide in this supernatural sequel to the hit turn-based strategy game. Visit the game's official website to sign-up to be eligible to join the limited Closed Beta and experience the game early: https://www.hardwestgame.com/

Join the community on Facebook, Discord and Reddit. Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1282410/Hard_West_2/

Hard West 2 delivers a classic Western world with a supernatural twist, where legends tell of an elusive ghost train with a bounty of gold for the taking. But when first-class con man Gin Carter raids the transport, he discovers this “ghost train” is exactly that! Now Gin must lead a posse of strange outlaws and chase down the Devil across a land touched by darkness, battling forces both living and undead.

The game’s expansive, character-driven story is brought to life by the voice talents of Kevin Conroy (Batman: The Animated Series), Darien Sills-Evans (Days Gone, League of Legends) and Adam Gifford (The Colony, Batman: Hush), plus a score by BAFTA Award winner Jason Graves (Dead Space, Tomb Raider) and story co-written by Origins Awards winner and New York Times bestselling author Matt Forbeck (Deadlands).

Hard West 2 is expected to launch this year on PC. Visit www.hardwestgame.com to sign up for the game’s closed beta, going on now through April 7. Join the community on Facebook, Discord and Reddit. Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1282410/Hard_West_2/
